page.description: There are several properties and functions available for manipulating a SemiCircularNumberDisplay control object.

property.name: rgraphSettings
property.description: Graph settings for the SemiCircularNumberDisplay control object. The following properties are available:

property.name: min
property.description: The minimum value displayed. See [Setting Min and Max Values at Run-time] for more information.

property.name: max
property.description: The maximum value displayed. See [Setting Min and Max Values at Run-time] for more information.

page.discussion: To get a SemiCircularNumberDisplay control object, use the [{dialog.object}.getControl] method:
page.example: //get the object for the 'NUM1' SemiCircularNumberDisplay Control var numObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('NUM1');

link.link: ux semicircularnumberdisplay set min max control

links.link: Setting Min and Max Values at Run-time
